sentences.sContent: He offered to avouch his innocence with his sword.
sentences.sContent_eng: He offered to avouch his innocence with his sword.
sentences.sCn: 他表示愿以剑来保证他是无辜的。

sentences.sContent: This certificate can neither be transferred and nor be used as gist or voucher for avouch , facility and or facility in disguised form.
